row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.JOB.DELETE_BLOB@GENERIC
row.description: Delete an existing Blob from Storage Container in Azure

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Account Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Access Key" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Container Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Blob Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Snapshot" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_SNAPSHOT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Lease ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_LEASE_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "DELETE_BLOB"
! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-storage" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-containername" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-blobname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[9] = "-snapshot" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_SNAPSHOT#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[11] = "-leaseid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_BLOB_LEASE_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AZR_STORAGE_ACCESS_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Build java arguments :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGS_STORAGE
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -accesskey %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -accesskey $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DELETE BLOB ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DELETE BLOB ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
